metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0557 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Open-source ARJ archiver 3.10.22 does not properly remove leading slashes from paths, which allows remote attackers to conduct absolute path traversal attacks and write to arbitrary files via multiple leading slashes in a path in an ARJ archive.

criterions.comment: arj: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
